TopicTitle: Crew skills, how do we see what they are?

Articles.Content: So I tried to put a pilot into my spaceship, found where the crew selection was, could not find what they were qualified in?
I don't think the crew have roles yet. There's no science or anything so consider them all pilots until then.
No engineers, forget EVA stuff then!
It's sandbox mode, everything is maxed out of the box
